Package io.ileukocyte.azuresophia.database

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
io.ileukocyte.azuresophia.database.UserDatabase
public class UserDatabase extends Object
A class containing methods to operate user profiles present in the program
ONLY FOR TEMPORARY DB SIMULATION PURPOSES!
